long_description: wir sind als kleines, mittelständisches handwerksunternehmen in der heizungs- und sanitärbranche tätig. als shk - mitglied erweisen wir uns seit über 40 jahren als kompetenter und zuverlässiger partner unserer kunden im privaten bereich und in der industrie.
generated_description: firma norbert gerhardt is a small, medium-sized business located in bad laasphe, germany that specializes in providing competent advice on solar, heating, and plumbing technology. they offer services such as construction, renovation, repair, and maintenance in the areas of solar, solar technology, heating technology, and sanitation. the company is a member of shk and has been a reliable partner to their clients for over 40 years as a shk-member. they also provide tips in the plumbing and heating industry.
